comments.id: Crawl id - used in output file name etc.
comments.output: Crawl output method. Allowed values: console, csv, json, blank
comments.allowedDomains: Only domains from this array will be crawled. Empty array will discard this check.
comments.allowedProtocols: Page protocols to crawl. Allowed values: http, https. Empty array will discard this check.
comments.allowLinksFrom: Only links that are found on a urls that matche given requirements will be crawled
comments.crawlLinks: Only links that matche given requirements will be crawled
comments.saveCrawlData: Only links that matche given requirements will be saved to output
comments.maxPages: Max pages to crawl. To have no limit set -1
